member.name: P:Syncfusion.Themes.Material3Light.WPF.Material3LightThemeSettings.Palette
member.summary: Gets or sets the palette primary colors to be set for specific theme.

value.para: One of the enumeration that specifies the palette to be chosen.

item.description: The Default palette primary colors will be applied for specific theme.
The EnglishRed palette primary colors will be applied for specific theme.
The JungleGreen palette primary colors will be applied for specific theme.
The DarkYellow palette primary colors will be applied for specific theme.
The SlateBlue palette primary colors will be applied for specific theme.
The OldLavender palette primary colors will be applied for specific theme.

member.remarks: Applicable only for ThemeStudio specific themes.
